channel.title: ::hit (playername)

item.title: ::hit (playername)
item.dc:creator: @Runer_King Runer King
item.description:
@Runer_King wrote:

When this command does it…The whirlpool does it on the player who does the command…

How do I fix it to do it on the player who needs to be sucked into a large whirlpool? LOL.

Here’s the command

[code] if (command.startsWith(“hit”)) {
{
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(4);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

					if (otherPIndex != -1) {
						client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

						p.sendMessage("You have been caught in a whirlpool!");
						p.animation(59, absY, absX);
						otherp.pEmote = 528;
						p.iceBarrage();
						p.updateRequired = true;
						p.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
					}
				} catch (Exception e) {
					sendMessage("Use as ::hit PLAYERNAME");
				}

			}[/code]

Read full topic
